name: 2 issue subscription (UK)
description:
for two issues (incl. p&p) UK subscribers

Brittle Star is a fantastic not-for-profit little magazine with a reputation for publishing talented writers at the beginning of their careers, and reflects a flourishing creative scene across the UK and beyond. Each issue is filled with fresh new poetry, short stories and articles, and regular features include a critical diary, close-readings and interviews with established writers. 

INSTRUCTIONS: Add your selection to the cart, then go to checkout. This will take you to Paypal where you can either sign in and pay or pay by credit/debit card. Your subscription will begin with the current issue unless you request otherwise in the ‘add special instructions’ box.

name: 2 issue subscription (World)
description:
for 2 issues (incl p&p) international subscribers

Brittle Star is a fantastic not-for-profit little magazine with a reputation for publishing talented writers at the beginning of their careers, and reflects a flourishing creative scene across the UK and beyond. The magazine has published contributions from writers all over the world including China, Africa, India, Japan, America, Australia, and Europe. Each issue is filled with fresh new poetry, short stories and articles, and regular features include a critical diary, close-readings and interviews with established writers.

INSTRUCTIONS: Add your selection to the cart, then go to checkout. This will take you to Paypal where you can either sign in and pay or pay by credit/debit card. Your subscription will begin with the current issue unless you request otherwise in the ‘add special instructions’ box.
